name: Forget me not (GoranBeast)
description:
A journey about the effects of Alzheimer. Seen through the perspective of the loving son (David) and that of a caring mother (Lillian).

Lillian has been diagnosed with Alzheimer a few years ago. She refuses to live anywhere else than the house she always knew. Her son, David, visits her daily. But today, he can't seem to find her.

Walk through their journey to find each other again.
